projectGridLines.stationName: Grasim Industries Ltd - Pulp & Fibre Business - Smart Asset Maintenance , Harihar
projectGridLines.title: Smart Maintenance System Deployment for Plant Assets
projectGridLines.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Oversee the deployment of Smart Asset Maintenance across 17,000 assets.
  • Provide support and guidance on the ground to understand user issues related to maintenance.
  • Collaborate with SAP Team to resolve technical issues and facilitate change management processes.


Learning Opportunities:

  • Gain hands-on experience with operations at the ground level.
  • Acquire knowledge focused on maintenance practices.
  • Obtain a high-level understanding of the PM module in SAP.
  • Learn about the implementation of industry 4.0 at the grassroots level.


Requirements:

  • Mechanical / IT 
  • Strong communication and liaison skills.
  • Ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues effectively.
  • Keen interest in learning about maintenance operations and industry 4.0 technologies.
